nodes.text: The Void Spider TX-3 Air Taxi, also called Void Spider THX 1138, was an enclosed airspeeder built by Bespin Motors and a type of air taxi.
It had a length of 7.6 meters and came equipped with eight engines, placed at the bottom of eight legs. These supported the speeder when on the ground and could function independently in the air.
Mission to Lianna describes the Void Spider TX-3 as a landspeeder, with a maximum altitude of only one meter.
The Star Wars Sourcebook mentions that it's one of the most popular landspeeders (instead of airspeeder), but doesn't give more details.
